Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor India to win based on their current form
Igor Stimac emphasized the importance of maintaining defensive shape and focus against Kuwait
Post-Match Reflections: Sunil Chhetri announced his retirement after the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be Sunil Chhetri's last for the Indian national team
Others: India and Kuwait have met three times in the last 12 months, with India winning once and drawing twice
